rules_text: Snatch and Grab deals 1 damage to any target. Create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]Xiong eyed the trinket. Was it a coin? A key?
An ancient relic? Whatever it was, he now had it, and Jake wanted it very, very badly.[/i]
